title: Research Topic: Vance Ideological Transformation Analysis (2016-2024)
summary: Based on the research priority 'Vance Ideological Transformation Analysis (2016-2024)', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Document Vance's comprehensive ideological conversion from Never Trump conservative to post-liberal authoritarian mirroring Thiel's evolution... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
